00031         TEXT("\"")      TEXT("%22"),
00032         TEXT("#")       TEXT("%23"),

00150 struct UrlParse
00151 {
00152         HRESULT m_hr;
00153         int m_nBufSize;
00154         TCHAR *m_szBuffer;
00155         TCHAR *m_szScheme;
00156         TCHAR *m_szPath;
00157         TCHAR *m_szSubpath;
00158         TCHAR *m_szSite;
00159         int m_nAttr;
00160         TCHAR **m_aszAttr;
00161         TCHAR **m_aszValue;
00162 };
00163 
00164 struct UrlCreate
00165 {
00166         HRESULT m_hr;
00167         int m_nBufPos;
00168         int m_nBufSize;
00169         int m_nAttr;
00170         TCHAR *m_szBuffer;
00171 };
00172 
00173 /*
00174         Please consult the following URL reference.
00175 
00176         http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc1738.txt
00177 
00178         Cidana PlayerControl URL format is as following example:
00179 
00180                         <scheme>://[<path>[?<attrs>]]
00181                 
00182                         where
00183                                 <path> = <site>/<subpath>
00184                                 <attrs> = [<attr1>[=<value1>][&<attr2>[=<value2>]&...]]     (optional)
00185 
00186                                 if no [=valuei] is present, the corresponding valuei is set to an empty string (not NULL).
00187 
00188                         also
00189                                 <site> =  <user>:<password>@<host>:<port>
00190                         but in general it is empty string, NULL string (if passed in) or localhost.
00191 
00192 */
00193 
00194 class CUrlParse : public UrlParse
00195 {
00196 public:
00197         CUrlParse(const TCHAR *szUrl)
00198         {
00199                 m_hr = E_FAIL;
00200                 m_nBufSize = 0;
00201                 m_szBuffer = NULL;
00202                 m_szScheme = NULL;
00203                 m_szPath = NULL;
00204                 m_szSite = NULL;
00205                 m_szSubpath = NULL;
00206                 m_nAttr = 0;
00207                 m_aszAttr = NULL;
00208                 m_aszValue = NULL;
00209                 m_hr = AllocBuffer(szUrl);
00210                 if(SUCCEEDED(m_hr))
00211                 {
00212                         TCHAR *dptr = m_szBuffer;
00213                         const TCHAR *sptr = szUrl;
00214 
00215                         m_hr = ParseStringToScheme(sptr, dptr);
00216                         if(SUCCEEDED(m_hr))
00217                                 m_hr = ParseStringToPath(sptr, dptr);
00218                         if(SUCCEEDED(m_hr))
00219                                 m_hr = ParseStringToAttrs(sptr, dptr);
00220                 }
00221         }
00222         ~CUrlParse()
00223         {
00224                 if(m_szBuffer)
00225                 {
00226                         delete[] m_szBuffer;
00227                         m_szBuffer = NULL;
00228                 }
00229                 if(m_szSite)
00230                 {
00231                         delete[] m_szSite;
00232                         m_szSite = NULL;
00233                 }
00234                 if(m_aszAttr)
00235                 {
00236                         delete[] m_aszAttr;
00237                         m_aszAttr = NULL;
00238                 }
00239                 if(m_aszValue)
00240                 {
00241                         delete[] m_aszValue;
00242                         m_aszValue = NULL;
00243                 }
00244         }
00245         bool IsOkay()
00246         {
00247                 return SUCCEEDED(m_hr);
00248         }
00249 
00250 protected:
00251         HRESULT AllocBuffer(const TCHAR *szUrl)
00252         {
00253                 int i,n;
00254                 
00255                 for(i=n=0;szUrl[i];i++)
00256                 {
00257                         if(szUrl[i]==_T('?') || szUrl[i]==_T('&'))
00258                                 n++;
00259                 }
00260                 m_nBufSize = i+2;       // possible extra empty space on attrs
00261                 if((m_szBuffer = new TCHAR[m_nBufSize])==NULL)
00262                         return E_FAIL;
00263                 if((m_aszAttr = new TCHAR *[n])==NULL)
00264                         return E_FAIL;
00265                 if((m_aszValue = new TCHAR *[n])==NULL)
00266                         return E_FAIL;
00267                 return S_OK;
00268         }
00269         HRESULT ParseStringToScheme(const TCHAR *&sptr, TCHAR *&dptr)
00270         {
00271                 TCHAR *dptr2;
00272 
00273                 removewhitespace(sptr);
00274                 if(*sptr==0)
00275                         return E_FAIL;
00276                 for(dptr2=dptr;*sptr;)
00277                 {
00278                         if(sptr[0]==_T(':') && sptr[1]==_T('/') && sptr[2]==_T('/'))
00279                         {
00280                                 *dptr2 = 0;
00281                                 m_szScheme = dptr;
00282                                 dptr = dptr2 + 1;
00283                                 sptr += 3;
00284                                 return S_OK;
00285                         }
00286                         unescape(sptr,dptr2);
00287                 }
00288                 return E_FAIL;          
00289         }
00290         HRESULT ParseStringToPath(const TCHAR *&sptr, TCHAR *&dptr)
00291         {
00292                 TCHAR *dptr2;
00293 
00294                 removewhitespace(sptr);
00295                 for(dptr2=dptr;*sptr;)
00296                 {
00297                         if(sptr[0]==_T('/'))
00298                         {
00299                                 if(m_szSite==NULL)
00300                                 {
00301                                         int len;
00302                                         
00303                                         len = (int)(dptr2-dptr);
00304                                         if((m_szSite = new TCHAR[len+1])==NULL)
00305                                                 return E_FAIL;
00306                                         memcpy(m_szSite,dptr,len);
00307                                         m_szSite[len] = 0;
00308                                         m_szSubpath = dptr+1;
00309                                 }
00310                         }
00311                         else if(sptr[0]==_T('?'))
00312                         {
00313                                 sptr++;
00314                                 break;
00315                         }
00316                         unescape(sptr, dptr2);
00317                 }
00318                 *dptr2 = 0;
00319                 m_szPath = dptr;
00320                 dptr = dptr2 + 1;
00321                 return S_OK;            
00322         }
00323         HRESULT ParseStringToAttrs(const TCHAR *&sptr, TCHAR *&dptr)
00324         {
00325                 TCHAR *dptr2;
00326                 unsigned attr_num;
00327 
00328                 for(dptr2=dptr,attr_num=0;*sptr;)
00329                 {
00330                         removewhitespace(sptr);
00331                         if(*sptr==0)
00332                                 break;
00333                         m_aszAttr[attr_num] = dptr2;
00334                         for(;*sptr;)
00335                         {
00336                                 if(sptr[0]==_T('='))
00337                                 {
00338                                         *dptr2++ = 0;
00339                                         sptr++;
00340                                         break;
00341                                 }
00342                                 if(sptr[0]==_T('&'))
00343                                 {
00344                                         *dptr2++ = 0;
00345                                         sptr++;
00346                                         m_aszValue[attr_num++] = dptr2; // add empty string
00347                                         goto gotval;
00348                                 }
00349                                 unescape(sptr, dptr2);
00350                         }
00351                         removewhitespace(sptr);
00352                         m_aszValue[attr_num++] = dptr2;         // always increment attribute
00353                         for(;*sptr;)
00354                         {
00355                                 if(sptr[0]==_T('&'))
00356                                 {
00357                                         *dptr2++ = 0;
00358                                         sptr++;
00359                                         goto gotval;
00360                                 }
00361                                 unescape(sptr, dptr2);
00362                         }
00363                         break;  // attribute incremented, all ok.
00364 gotval:;
00365                 }
00366                 *dptr2++ = 0;
00367                 m_nAttr = attr_num;
00368                 dptr = dptr2;
00369                 return S_OK;
00370         }
00371         static inline void removewhitespace(const TCHAR *&sptr)
00372         {
00373                 for(;*sptr==' '||*sptr=='\t'||*sptr=='\n';sptr++);      // remove whitespace
00374         }
00375         static inline TCHAR charof(unsigned val)
00376         {
00377                 if(val<10)
00378                         return val + _T('0');
00379                 if(val<16)
00380                         return val - 10 + _T('A');
00381                 return _T('2'); // should never happen
00382         }
00383         static inline int tohexval(TCHAR tc)
00384         {
00385                 if(tc>=_T('0') && tc<=_T('9'))
00386                         return tc-_T('0');
00387                 if(tc>=_T('a') && tc<=_T('f'))
00388                         return tc - _T('a') + 10;
00389                 if(tc>=_T('A') && tc<=_T('F'))
00390                         return tc - _T('A') + 10;
00391                 return -1;
00392         }
00393         static inline void unescape(const TCHAR *&sptr, TCHAR *&dptr)
00394         {
00395                 int val1, val2;
00396 
00397                 if(sptr[0]==_T('%'))
00398                 {
00399                         if((val1 = tohexval(sptr[1]))>=0 &&
00400                                 (val2 = tohexval(sptr[2]))>=0)
00401                         {
00402                                 *dptr++ = val1<<4|val2;
00403                                 sptr += 3;
00404                                 return;
00405                         }
00406                 }
00407                 *dptr++ = *sptr++;
00408         }
00409         static HRESULT CiUrlUnescape(const TCHAR *pszUrl, TCHAR *pszUnescaped, LPDWORD pcchUnescaped, DWORD dwFlags)
00410         {
00411                 TCHAR *buf, *maxbuf;
00412 
00413                 if(pszUrl == NULL || pszUnescaped == NULL || pcchUnescaped == NULL)
00414                         return E_POINTER;
00415                 maxbuf = pszUnescaped + *pcchUnescaped - 1;
00416                 for(buf=pszUnescaped;*pszUrl && pszUnescaped<maxbuf;)
00417                         unescape(pszUrl, buf);
00418                 *buf = 0;
00419                 *pcchUnescaped = (int)(buf-pszUnescaped); // strlen
00420                 return S_OK;
00421         }
00422 };
00423 
00424 class CUrlCreate : public UrlCreate
00425 {
00426 public:
00427         CUrlCreate(const TCHAR *szScheme, const TCHAR *szPath)
00428         {
00429                 CreateBuf(szScheme, NULL, szPath, 0, NULL, NULL);
00430         }
00431         CUrlCreate(const TCHAR *szScheme, const TCHAR *szSite, const TCHAR *szSubpath)
00432         {
00433                 CreateBuf(szScheme, szSite, szSubpath, 0, NULL, NULL);
00434         }
00435         CUrlCreate(const TCHAR *szScheme, const TCHAR *szPath, int nAttr,  const TCHAR * const *aszAttr, const  TCHAR * const *aszValue)
00436         {
00437                 CreateBuf(szScheme, NULL, szPath, nAttr, aszAttr, aszValue);
00438         }
00439         CUrlCreate(const TCHAR *szScheme, const TCHAR *szSite, const TCHAR *szSubpath, int nAttr,  const TCHAR * const *aszAttr, const  TCHAR * const *aszValue)
00440         {
00441                 CreateBuf(szScheme, szSite, szSubpath, nAttr, aszAttr, aszValue);
00442         }
00443         void CreateBuf(const TCHAR *szScheme, const TCHAR *szSite, const TCHAR *szSubpath, int nAttr,  const TCHAR * const *aszAttr, const  TCHAR * const *aszValue)
00444         {
00445                 int i, n, len;
00446 
00447                 m_nBufSize = m_nBufPos = 0;
00448                 m_szBuffer = NULL;
00449                 m_nAttr = 0;
00450                 len = 0;
00451                 len += escapelen(szScheme);
00452                 len += 3;
00453                 len += escapelen(szSite);
00454                 len += 1;
00455                 len += escapelen(szSubpath);
00456                 len += 1;
00457                 for(i=0;i<nAttr;i++)
00458                 {
00459                         len += escapelen(aszAttr[i]);
00460                         len += escapelen(aszValue[i]);
00461                         len += 2;
00462                 }
00463                 m_nBufSize = len+1+4+URLCREATE_EXPANSION;       // 4 chr buffer
00464                 m_szBuffer = (TCHAR *)malloc(m_nBufSize*sizeof(m_szBuffer[0]));
00465                 if(m_szBuffer==NULL)
00466                 {
00467                         m_hr = E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00468                         return;
00469                 }
00470                 n = escapestr(szScheme,m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00471                 if(n>=0)
00472                 {
00473                         m_nBufPos += n;
00474                         n = copystr(_T("://"),m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00475                 }
00476                 if(n>=0)
00477                 {
00478                         m_nBufPos += n;
00479                         if(szSite)
00480                         {
00481                                 n = escapestr(szSite,m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos, g_URLTransStringSite);
00482                                 if(n>=0)
00483                                 {
00484                                         m_nBufPos += n;
00485                                         n = copystr(_T("/"),m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00486                                 }
00487                         }
00488                         else
00489                                 n = 0;
00490                 }
00491                 if(n>=0)
00492                 {
00493                         m_nBufPos += n;
00494                         if(szSubpath)
00495                                 n = escapestr(szSubpath,m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos,g_URLTransStringPath);
00496                         else
00497                                 n = 0;
00498                 }
00499                 if(n>=0)
00500                 {
00501                         m_nBufPos += n;
00502                         for(i=0;i<nAttr;i++)
00503                                 AddToBuf(aszAttr[i], aszValue[i]);
00504                 }
00505                 m_hr = n>=0 ? S_OK : E_FAIL;
00506         }
00507         ~CUrlCreate()
00508         {
00509                 if(m_szBuffer)
00510                 {
00511                         free(m_szBuffer);
00512                         m_szBuffer = NULL;
00513                 }
00514         }
00515         operator TCHAR *()
00516         {
00517                 return m_szBuffer;
00518         }
00519         HRESULT AddToBuf(const TCHAR *szAttr, const  TCHAR *szValue)
00520         {
00521                 int len, n;
00522 
00523                 len = 1;
00524                 len += escapelen(szAttr);
00525                 len += escapelen(szValue);
00526                 len += 2;
00527                 len += m_nBufPos+1+4;
00528                 if(m_nBufSize<=len)
00529                 {
00530                         TCHAR *newbuf;
00531 
00532                         len += URLCREATE_EXPANSION;
00533                         newbuf = (TCHAR *)realloc(m_szBuffer,len*sizeof(m_szBuffer[0]));
00534                         if(newbuf==NULL)
00535                                 return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00536                         m_szBuffer = newbuf;
00537                         m_nBufSize = len;
00538                 }
00539                 n = copystr(m_nAttr==0? _T("?") : _T("&"),m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00540                 if(n>=0)
00541                 {
00542                         m_nBufPos += n;
00543                         n = escapestr(szAttr,m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00544                 }
00545                 if(n>=0)
00546                 {
00547                         m_nBufPos += n;
00548                         n = copystr(_T("="),m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00549                 }
00550                 if(n>=0)
00551                 {
00552                         m_nBufPos += n;
00553                         n = escapestr(szValue,m_szBuffer+m_nBufPos,m_nBufSize-m_nBufPos);
00554                 }
00555                 if(n>=0)
00556                         m_nBufPos += n;
00557                 m_nAttr++;
00558                 return n>=0 ? S_OK : E_FAIL;
00559         }
00560 
00561 protected:
00562 
00563         static int escapestr(const TCHAR *sptr, TCHAR *dptr, int dbufsize, const TCHAR *escstring = g_URLTransString)
00564         {
00565                 TCHAR *maxbuf, *dptr2;
00566 
00567                 if(sptr==NULL)
00568                         return 0;
00569                 maxbuf = dptr + dbufsize - 4;
00570                 for(dptr2=dptr; *sptr && dptr2<maxbuf;)
00571                         escape(sptr,dptr2, escstring);
00572                 *dptr2 = 0;
00573                 return (int)(dptr2-dptr); //strlen
00574         }
00575         static int copystr(const TCHAR *sptr, TCHAR *dptr, int dbufsize)
00576         {
00577                 TCHAR *maxbuf, *dptr2;
00578 
00579                 if(sptr==NULL)
00580                         return 0;
00581                 maxbuf = dptr + dbufsize-1;
00582                 for(dptr2=dptr; *sptr && dptr2<maxbuf;)
00583                         *dptr2++ = *sptr++;
00584                 *dptr2 = 0;
00585                 return (int)(dptr2-dptr); //strlen
00586         }
00587         static inline void escape(const TCHAR *&sptr, TCHAR *&dptr, const TCHAR *escstring = g_URLTransString)
00588         {
00589                 TCHAR c = *sptr++;
00590 
00591                 if(isesc(c, escstring))
00592                 {
00593                         *dptr++ = _T('%');
00594                         *dptr++ = lowhexcharof(c>>4);
00595                         *dptr++ = lowhexcharof(c);
00596                         return;
00597                 }
00598                 *dptr++ = c;
00599         }
00600         static HRESULT CiUrlEscape(const TCHAR *pszUrl, TCHAR *pszEscaped, LPDWORD pcchEscaped, DWORD dwFlags)
00601         {
00602                 if(pszUrl==NULL || pszEscaped==NULL || pcchEscaped==NULL)
00603                         return E_POINTER;
00604                 *pcchEscaped = escapestr(pszUrl,pszEscaped,*pcchEscaped)+1;
00605                 return S_OK;
00606         }
00607         inline static TCHAR lowhexcharof(unsigned val)
00608         {
00609                 val &= 0xf;
00610                 if(val<10)
00611                         return val + _T('0');
00612                 return val - 10 + _T('A');
00613         }
00614         inline static bool isesc(TCHAR c, const TCHAR *escstring = g_URLTransString)
00615         {
00616                 return ((unsigned)c) >= 0x80 || _tcschr(escstring,c);
00617         }
00618         static int escapelen(const TCHAR *sptr)
00619         {
00620                 int n;
00621 
00622                 if(sptr==NULL)
00623                         return 0;
00624                 for(n=0;*sptr;sptr++)
00625                 {
00626                         if(isesc(*sptr))
00627                                 n += 3;
00628                         else
00629                                 n++;
00630                 }
00631                 return n;
00632         }
00633         static const int URLCREATE_EXPANSION = 128;
00634 };
00635
